dynamic_line.yes: I thought I smelled a pig.  I jest... please don't arrest me.
dynamic_line.no: Huh, thought I smelled someone new.  Can I help you?

responses.text: What do you do around here?

dynamic_line: Oh, I didn't mean that in a bad way.  Been out in the wilderness so long, I find myself noticing things by scent before sight.
I trade food here in exchange for a place to crash and general supplies.  Well, more specifically I trade food that isn't stale chips and flat cola.
Not really, just trying to lead my life.
Yep.  Whatever game I spot, I bag and sell the meat and other parts here.  Got the occasional fish and basket full of wild fruit, but nothing comes close to a freshly-cooked moose steak for supper!

responses.text: Great, now my mouth is watering...

dynamic_line: Sure, just bagged a fresh batch of meat.  You may want to grill it up before it gets too, uh... 'tender'.
